errors.error_description: The README recommends using QIIME 2 version 2019.1, which is outdated and may have compatibility issues with the current Qiita system or other modern dependencies.
correction_candidates: Remove the specific version recommendation to allow users to install the latest compatible version.
Update the recommendation to a more recent version, such as QIIME 2 version 2023.9.
Recommend installing QIIME 2 via its native conda installation instructions for the latest version.
Advise users to check the official QIIME 2 documentation for the currently supported version before installing.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the specific version recommendation to allow users to install the latest compatible version.
